title: Practo Doctors Scraper
description: Extract verified doctor profiles from Practo with speciality, location, ratings, experience, and consultation fees. Supports JSON API and HTML parsing.

startUrl.title: Start URL
startUrl.description: Direct Practo doctor listing URL (e.g., https://www.practo.com/bangalore/dermatologist). If provided, this overrides speciality and city fields.

speciality.title: Speciality
speciality.description: Doctor speciality to search for (e.g., dermatologist, cardiologist, dentist, gynecologist).

city.title: City
city.description: City name for doctor search (e.g., bangalore, delhi, mumbai, pune, hyderabad).

locality.title: Locality (Optional)
locality.description: Specific locality within the city (e.g., koramangala, indiranagar). Leave empty for city-wide search.

results_wanted.title: Maximum Results
results_wanted.description: Maximum number of doctor profiles to extract.

max_pages.title: Maximum Pages
max_pages.description: Maximum number of listing pages to scrape (safety limit).

minExperience.title: Minimum Experience (Years)
minExperience.description: Filter doctors by minimum years of experience.

minRating.title: Minimum Rating (%)
minRating.description: Filter doctors by minimum rating percentage (0-100).

proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy Configuration
proxyConfiguration.description: Proxy settings for requests. Residential proxies recommended for best results.
